synopsis.text:
Enchanted chaos ensues as Akko, Lotte, and Sucy, three apprentice witches with a penchant for mischief, find themselves on the brink of expulsion from the esteemed Luna Nova Magical Academy. To avoid this dire fate, they must successfully orchestrate the academy's annual parade, a celebration steeped in tradition and magic. But when they uncover the unsettling truth behind the parade's origins - a commemoration of witch trials and subjugation - Akko, inspired by her childhood idol, the enigmatic Shiny Chariot, resolves to transform the event into a dazzling spectacle showcasing the prowess of modern witches.

With the help of three fellow troublemakers, Amanda, Constanze, and Jasmineka, they must navigate through a labyrinth of challenges, including meddlesome boys, ambitious mayors, and even slumbering giants. As the parade day approaches, the young witches must harness their magical abilities and work together to create an unforgettable event that not only secures their place in the academy but also redefines the world's perception of witchcraft. Prepare for a magical extravaganza as Akko and her friends embark on a thrilling journey to make their Enchanted Parade a resounding success!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
